mapper.insert: insert into message (msg_id, msg_content,msg_regdate,sender, receiver, type_id) values (msg_seq.nextval,#{msg_content},sysdate,#{sender},#{receiver},#{type_id})
mapper.select: SELECT m.receiver,m.msg_id, m.msg_content, m.msg_regdate , m.read_check, m.sender, r.r_authority FROM message m JOIN resident r on m.sender = r.r_id WHERE m.receiver = #{reciever} ORDER BY m.msg_regdate DESC
mapper.update: update message set read_check ='Y' where msg_id = #{msg_id}
